jobs.description: Time spent collecting and analyzing reports
jobs.toolTip: ReadyAPI provides robust reporting in many different formats including Junit, CSV, HTML, and PDF. They can be centralized by storing them in shared repositories.

jobs.description: Time spent scheduling test environments and test data
jobs.toolTip: ReadyAPI allows teams to virtualize infrastructure and data so they can accurately systems without having to wait for upstream dependencies.

jobs.description: Time spent writing new automated test scripts
jobs.toolTip: Import an API definition to get started validating APIs in just seconds after design or development. ReadyAPI will automatically create test cases for each endpoint and parameter, reducing time spent creating test cases and assertions.
With just a few clicks, ReadyAPI can update and refactor their tests after modification to the APIs code, giving you the speed you need when testing during continuous deployments.

jobs.description: Time spent maintaining the CI/CD pipeline
jobs.toolTip: CI/CD pipelines are central to software delivery, and ReadyAPI works right inside your organization's infrastructure - giving you the test runners you need to execute performance, functional, and security tests continously.

jobs.description: Time spent creating automated test scripts
jobs.toolTip: ReadyAPI allows engineers to create complex functional, security, and performance tests in just minutes from API definitions or live API endpoints. Create assertions using our visual editor or intelligent Smart Assertions.

jobs.description: Time spent maintaining automated test scripts
jobs.toolTip: ReadyAPI has refactoring capabilities making it simple to mirror changes between your API code and the tests that validate them. Import your API definition for automated refactoring.
ReadyAPI allows teams to virtualize the APIs and services that slow them down during testing. Test hard to recreate scenarios, bad data, or against services that don't yet exist

jobs.description: Time spent documenting bugs and defects
jobs.toolTip: ReadyAPI has native integrations with Jira or test management tools like Zephyr for Jira. Share bugs and defects with teammates quickly.
